title: Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers | Science & Engineering Kit | Build 20 Models | Learn about Force, Load, Compression, Tension | Parents' Choice Gold Award Winner, Blue
descriptions: Unleash your inner engineer with the Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers Science & Engineering Kit! Winner of the prestigious Parents' Choice Gold Award, this kit comes in a sleek blue color and includes everything you need to build 20 different models. With 285 pieces and a 36-page illustrated experiment manual and assembly guide, this kit is perfect for intermediate-level builders. Learn about force, load, compression, and tension as you explore the world of structural engineering. From trusses and arches to shells and catenaries, this kit covers it all. Explore different types of bridges, including truss, arch, cantilever, rope, and suspension bridges. With a focus on mechanical physics and structural engineering, this kit is sure to provide hours of educational fun. Don't miss out on this incredible learning opportunity - get your Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering kit today!

Unleash your inner engineer with the Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers kit! This award-winning Science & Engineering Kit will allow you to build 20 different models using the 285 included pieces. Learn about force, load, compression, and tension while exploring the structural elements of columns, beams, trusses, plates, arches, shells, and catenary. With a skill level of intermediate, this kit is perfect for those looking to dive into the world of mechanical physics and structural engineering. The illustrated experiment manual and assembly guide make it easy to get started on your journey to understanding the strength and stability of structures. Join the ranks of the Parents' Choice Gold Award winners and grab your Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering kit today!
